org.drip.measure.crng

Class RandomNumberGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.crng.RandomNumberGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearCongruentialGenerator, LogNormalRandomNumberGenerator, ShiftRegisterGenerator

    public class RandomNumberGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    RandomNumberGenerator provides the Functionality to generate Random Numbers. Default simply forwards to the Native JRE/JDK Implementation.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
